247177.<center>ー 優美なる夜明け ー\nヌッジォ・ラ・ヌァグータ 画\n<br:
ー The Graceful Dawn ー Nugio La Naguta, painting.
It depicts the dawn of the demon world realistically with light colors and a delicate touch. It's a more subdued style compared to
his other paintings.

247178.<center>ー 朝食 その悲しみ ー\nマデサゴーラ 画\n<br>\nなん:
ー Breakfast The Sadness ー Madesagora, painting.
A painting by the Great Demon King Madesagora is on display... You took a long look at it.
It's a painting with a geometric pattern that fills the canvas with creative shapes. You can't quite figure out what's breakfast and
what's sad.

247179.<center>ー 森（愛にも似た景色） ー\nヒューデン 画\n<br>\n森:
ー The Forest (A View Resmbling Love) ー Huden, painting.
A blood-like stain and a line resembling the shape of an eye are drawn over a forest landscape.
The painting makes you feel uneasy when you look at it.

247180.<center>ー 復讐の旅立ち ー\nサ・ラジョンナ 画\n<br>\nまばゆ:
ー Departure of Revenge ー Sa Lajonna, painting.
It depicts a demon leaving for somewhere in the midst of blinding light. Maybe the motif is the Great Demon King going off to Astoltia.

247181.<center>ー こごえるウドラー ー\nシジュラン・チー 画\n<br>\n:
ー Freezing Treevil ー Sijran Chi, painting.
It's looks like a picture of a creature in the process of freezing that doesn't even look like a Treevil, but is it imaginary or real?

247182.<center>ー 大輪なる戦火 ー\nフェルバンドー 画\n<br>\n燃え盛:
ー The Great War Fire ー Felbando, painting.
The demons that fight against the blazing fire are depicted with a powerful touch.

247419.テーブルの上に\n色あざやかな表紙の本が 置いてある。\nどうやら 誰かの日記帳:
There is a book on the table with a colorful cover. It looks like someone's diary.
It's been a long time since he left this country. By now, he must have traveled to Astoltia to see the beauty of the landscape.
Why did he leave me here without saying a word? I've been thinking about it for a long time, but I can't come up with an answer. I
had dreamed so much about the day we would leave together. I can't keep repeating the same question over and over again. Now all the
memories of our good times have faded, and all I can do is hope for the day when this pain will fade as well.

248336.<center>↑道なり 砂の都ファラザード\n<left>←ズムウル峠 危険！:
↑ Road to Farazard
← Zumul Pass, Danger!

249269.羽ペンが 描かれている。\n文字を書くための 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a quill.
It's a tool for writing letters.

249270.木づちが 描かれている。\n彫刻の際に使われる 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a wooden mallet.
It's a tool used when engraving.

249271.はさみが 描かれている。\n布を切るための 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of shears.
It's a tool for cutting cloth.

249272.パレットが 描かれている。\n顔料を載せるための 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a palette.
It's a tool for placing paint.

249273.コテが 描かれている。\n塗装の際に使われる 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a trowel.
It's a tool used when painting.

249274.絵筆が 描かれている。\n絵を描くための 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a paintbrush.
It's a tool for painting pictures.

251043.上の棚には 子供向けの本が\n並んでいる。\n<br>\nオバケのピッピ 第１巻:
On the top shelf, there are books for children... Pippy the Obake Vol. 1: The Boy Who Wouldn't Sleep... I'll Take You With Me!
... It says...

251044.上の棚には 子供向けの本が\n並んでいる。\n<br>\nオバケのピッピ 第２巻:
On the top shelf, there are books for children... Pippy the Obake, Vol. 2 - I'll take you with me, no questions asked! ... It
says...

251045.棚には 子供向けの本が\n並んでいる。\n<br>\nオバケのピッピ 第３巻\n:
The shelves are lined with books for children... Pippy the Obake Vol. 3... Even if she doesn't like it, I'll take her without
question! ... It says...

251046.棚には 月明かりの家の\n日誌が 並んでいるようだ。:
The shelves are lined with the journals of
the House of Moonlight...

251048.子供たちが描いた 絵のようだ。\n<br>\nつきあかりのいえ まおうさま\nオ:
The children's drawings... The house of the
moonlight, Maoussama, Pippy the ghost... It
says...

251049.溶鉱炉からは 近づくだけで\n汗がふき出すほどの 熱気が放たれている……。:
The blast furnaces are so hot you'll break
out in a sweat just getting close...

252990.<center>ここはジャディンの園\n<center>弱き魔物たちの保護区なり:
This is Jadin's Garden
A sanctuary for weak demons

252991.<center>ここはジャディンの園\n<center>弱き魔物たちの保護区なり:

253137.この先 大審門\n門をくぐる者は 一切の希望を捨てよ:
Demongate Ahead
Those who pass through these gates must
abandon all hope.

254087.深い色をした泉が 水をたたえている……。\n見ていると なんだか寒気がしてきた。:
A deep-colored spring filled with water... I
get chills looking at it...

254161.<center>ー 勝利の宝槍 ー\n<br>\n伝統の 馬上槍試合の優勝者だけ:
The javelin of victory. - Only the winner of
the traditional jousting tournament is
allowed to carry it in the victory parade.

254162.<center>ー ゼクリアの大皿 ー\n<br>\n王の後継者が誕生せし時 こ:
The Zechariah Platter. - When a king's successor is born, he is blessed on this platter to be a good king, and when he dies,
his head is placed on the platter.

254163.<center>ー 四臣の宝剣 ー\n<br>\n建国王ワラキウスに従いし ４豪:
The sword of the four vassals... - ...who follow the founding king, Wallachius... - ...to the four great families... The king is
represented by the jewel on the hilt. On the hilt is inscribed, "I pledge eternal loyalty..."

254164.<center>ー ワラキウスの宝盾 ー\n<br>\nその比類なき魔力で ゼク:
The shield of Wallachius... the beautiful emblem of King Wallachius, whose unparalleled magic made him the founder of Zekres. On the
back is inscribed, "The strongest shield is wisdom."

254165.<center>ー ゼクリアの黄金杯 ー\n<br>\n建国王ワラキウスの妹 ゼ:
Zechariah's Golden Grail. - Zechariah, the
sister of the founding king Wallachius, took
the blood of her brother when he died.

254166.<center>ー 王妃の礼杓 ー\n<br>\n代々のゼクレス王妃が 典礼の場:
The Queen's Ladle... a magical offering of protection that every Queen of Zecres is expected to carry on her liturgical
occasions.

254167.<center>ー とむらいの王冠 ー\n<br>\n王家に弔事ありしとき 喪が:
The crown of warriors. - The crown of
warriors. - The crown of warriors.

254168.<center>ー 銀翼竜の角 ー\n<br>\n１０００年を経て 結晶化した:
The horn of the silver pterodactyl... - ...crystallized over 1,000 years... A gift from the head of the Verrastor family to
celebrate the founding of the castle of Zekres...

254169.<center>ー 魔瘴封じの護り ー\n<br>\n魔瘴石の結晶を かたどった:
The miasma protector... a crystal of Miasmite... When Zekres Castle was built, it was decorated on the roof to protect the
castle from the miasma...

254170.<center>ー サバスの宝斧 ー\n<br>\nかつて ゲルヘナ幻野を支配し:
The Axe of Sabbath. - It was handed down from generation to generation by the chief of Sabbath, the barbarian tribe that once ruled
Gehenna. A gift from the barbarians to celebrate the founding of their country...

254171.<center>ー いつわりの占水晶 ー\n<br>\n大占術師アズウェンが用い:
"The crystal of wickedness. "When the Lord is
condemned to death, he will answer every
question with nothing but a lie.

254172.<center>ー 魔仙卿の錫杖 ー\n<br>\n大魔王選出の儀に向かう途中:
The Immortal Lord's Staff. - Given to him by the Immortal Lord out of compassion for King Zekles, who fell ill on his way to the

254732.門は かたく 閉ざされている。\n魔幻園の 別の入り口に通じていたようだが\n地:
The gate is tightly closed. It seems to have led to another entrance to the Demon's Den, but the terrain has changed and it's
impassable.

254733.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
Overturned A strange object
It's engraved with the words...Fortune: "Great Luck"
The world revolves around you.Everything is going to be just the way you
want it...... Madesagora's work on the ...I don't see any more tricks...Apparently, it doesn't mean anything...

254734.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
Overturned A strange object
It's engraved with the words...Fortune: "Good Luck"
The power of the mystic is all around me.Everything's gonna be okay...... Madesagora's work on the ...I don't see any more tricks...Apparently, it doesn't mean anything...

254735.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
Overturned A strange object
It's engraved with the words...Fortune: "Medium luck"
I've had some good luck with that.I'll make you feel good...... Madesagora's work on the ...I don't see any more tricks...Apparently, it doesn't mean anything...

254736.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
Overturned A strange object
It's engraved with the words...Fortune: "Shokichi"
Ordinary times...It's what doesn't happen...... Madesagora's work on the ...I don't see any more tricks...Apparently, it doesn't mean anything...

254737.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
Overturned A strange object
It's engraved with the words..."Bad luck"
An innocent demon, a love...Everything that could go wrong...... Madesagora's work on the ...I don't see any more tricks...Apparently, it doesn't mean anything...

254738.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
Overturned A strange object
It's engraved with the words...Fortune: "Big bad"
You're in a horrible nightmare...Every moment of your life, you're burning in
the fires of hell.... Madesagora's work on the ...I don't see any more tricks...Apparently, it doesn't mean anything...

254739.<center>ー 影と光の抱擁 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 作<br>:
Embrace of Shadow and Light
by Madesagora
From a picture drawn in shadow and light
Like two hands embracing the void
Pop out...It's... The texture of his hands is very...I'm staring at it, and any second now
It starts to move, and I'm pulled into the
painting...

254740.<center>ー したたる欲望 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 作<br>:
Lust
by Madesagora
It's a snarky ob-gyn with differently shaped
wings. a hand reaching out like a spray
Is it an expression of desire?

254741.<center>ー 自由なるラ・テート ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 作<:
Free La Tete - Free La Tete
by Madesagora
It's got a feathered head, insect-like
legs... I've seen the earrings in your ears before
Maybe he's modeled after the author
himself...

254742.<center>ー 目覚め あるいは 祈り ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ:
Awakenings, prayers
by Madesagora
Two thorns entwined in a large eyeball...It's like he's staring at me
It's the kind of work that makes your heart
race when you're around it...

254743.<pc>は 目の前の絵をながめた。<br>\n……作成途中とおぼしき 巨大な絵だ:
<pc> "Look at the picture in front of you... ... A
gigantic... It appears to be a self-portrait
of Madhesa Gora.

254744.大きな絵筆が 無造作に置かれている。\nマデサゴーラは これで 絵を描いていたよ:
A large paintbrush, haphazardly placed...
Madesagora used to paint with this...

254745.<pc>は ハンドルを調べてみた。<br>\n……どうやら 絵を吊るす装置のよう:
<pc> Check the handle... ... It seems that the
device that hangs the paintings... I don't
know if it's broken or if it's moving...

254746.シャンデリアが 床に転がっている。\n……天井が壊れた時に 落ちてしまったようだ:
There's a chandelier lying on the floor...
... It fell out when the ceiling broke...

254747.ツボの中は 顔料で 満たされている……。\n中身は まだ 乾いていないようだ。\:
The urn is filled with pigment... The inside
is not yet dry... It's a special pigment...

254748.<pc>は 目の前の絵をながめた。<br>\n……マデサゴーラが描いた 未完成の:
"Look at the picture in front of you... ... ...of an unfinished painting by Madhesagora... What will it look like when
it's finished?

254749.<pc>は イーゼルの絵をながめた。<br>\n……マデサゴーラが描いた 未完成:
<pc> ...is a painting on an easel... ... ...of an
unfinished painting by Madhesagora... I lost
interest in it halfway through...

254750.カンバスが 散乱している。\n天井が壊れた衝撃で 散らかったのだろうか。:
The canvas was scattered. The impact of the
broken ceiling must have caused the mess.

254751.とても 大きなベッドだ。\n……どうやら アトリエに こもっている時\nマデサゴ:
It's a very large bed... ... Apparently, this
is where Madhesagora slept when she was holed
up in her studio...

257547.<center>大魔道士リドの遺産は ここにあり。\n汝 我が遺産を 求めるなら:
The legacy of the great mage Lido lies here... If thou wilt seek my legacy, which lies in the depths of the mausoleum, come to
me.

257548.<center>大魔道士リドの遺産は\n知恵と 意志ある者にのみ 授けられる。\:
The legacy of the great mage Lido will only
be given to those who have the wisdom and the
will... Three words...

257549.古びた石碑の 中央には\nこう 刻まれている……。\n<br>\n<center:
In the center of the old stone monument is
inscribed..."われわれジ"

257550.古びた石碑の 中央には\nこう 刻まれている……。\n<br>\n<center:
In the center of the old stone monument is
inscribed..."I'll take that"

257551.古びた石碑の 中央には\nこう 刻まれている……。\n<br>\n<center:
In the center of the old stone monument is
inscribed..."Shut up!"

257552.<center>大魔道士リドの遺産は\n知恵と 意志ある者にのみ 授けられる。\:
The legacy of the great mage Lido will only be given to those with wisdom and will. The three words must be combined in the correct
order and recited in front of this monument in an audible voice.

257620.<left><pc>は\n石碑に刻まれた文字を 読んだ。\n<br>\n<cen:
<pc>  ...is the inscription on a stone monument...I trust only in my own strength and wisdom
No one controls me I live as my own god
That's the true way of being a demon
 
I'm a sucker for the power of magic
There's no shortage of people who want to enslave others
The only thing you have to control is your own mind
 
Tormented by the art of binding
At least try to help
I will leave some of my strength here
 
be that as it may
Only those who can stand on their own two feet can be saved
He who cannot defeat my image will not be saved

257654.<center>ー 美しき 我が宮殿 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 画\n:
My beautiful palace
Madhesagora Painting
 
It's a vibrantly colored, glamorous depiction
of a magical palace...

257655.<center>ー パートス ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 画\n<br>:
Partos Madhesagora Painting The wings are painted with a glittering... At first glance, it's fantastic and brightly colored, but there's something evil about
it...

257656.<pc>は 絵画を ながめた。\n<br>\n……タイトルや 作者名が 見当たら:
<pc> The painting... ... I can't find the title or
the artist. Apparently, it's a study of
Madisagora's work, copied by Pepelogola...

257657.<center>ー 愚かなる悪霊の吐息 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 画\:
The breath of a foolish demon
Madhesagora Painting
 
There's a creepy little beak on the ground,
and it's blowing some kind of smoke... ...
What do you think it represents?

257658.<center>ー 雷葬 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 画\n<br>\n:
Thunderbolt funeral Madhesagora Painting ... I don't know exactly what it depicts, but it's strangely overwhelming... ... ... I found myself getting goosebumps...
Apparently, I've been staring at it for a long time.

259373.返事がない。\nただの しかばねのようだ……。:
There's no response.
It's just a corpse.

259374.返事がない。\nただの しかばねのようだ……。:
There's no response.
It's just a corpse.

260731.アストルティア製の 望遠鏡がある。\n<pc>は 望遠鏡を のぞいてみた。\n<:
It's an Astrotec telescope...<pc> Look through the telescope... From the
telescope, you can get a good view of the
castle town...

260732.アストルティア製の 望遠鏡がある。\n<pc>は 望遠鏡を のぞいてみた。\n<:
It's an Astrotec telescope...<pc> Look through the telescope... From the
telescope, you can get a good view of the
castle town...

260733.机の上に 古びた詩集が置いてある。\n表紙の裏には 署名が 書かれていた。\n<:
There's an old book of poems on my desk... On
the back of the cover is a signature... The
library of the Demon Lord Eevee of Zekres.

260735.ゼクレス城内のインテリアには そぐわない\nさわやかな色彩の品々が 置いてある。:
The interior of the castle of Zecres is filled with freshly colored objects that don't match the decor... Apparently, a
souvenir from the Verrinard...

rest...
